title.value: Особенности развития вегетативной сферы таксонов рода Oxycoccus на торфяной выработке в белорусском Полесье
Features of the development of vegetative sphere taxa genus Oxycoccus in cut-over peat deposit in Belarusian Polesje

journal.title: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences of Belarus. Biological Series

person.name: Reshetnikov, V.N., National Academy of Sciences, Minsk (Belarus). Central Botanical Garden

abstract.value: The results of a comparative study of the parameters of the autonomic areas of aboriginal species of Oxycoccus palustris and 4 intriduces cultivars of Oxycoccus macrocarpus (Ben Lear, Franklin, Mc Farlin and Stevens) in the experimental culture in the area of marginal and residual layer of strongly acidic peat bottom in the Pripyat Polesie are presented. Characteristics of plant habitus of Oxycoccus species in field experiment in the end of vegetative period are shown. Biometrical indexes of current annual increment of vegetative organs of Oxycoccus plants are offered. Comparative analysis of the Oxycoccus palustris and Oxycoccus macrocarpus plants is made. It is determined, that the highest biometric indexes of current annual increment of vegetative organs and leaves formation is typical for Ben Lear sort of Oxycoccus macrocarpus. The results of the research reveal activation of the development of vegetative offsprings of the plants adequately to the expansion to the northern direction.
